A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Pluses:
High production value.

Minuses:
Everything else.

I'm not a crazy Star Wars fan\, but I enjoyed the original trilogy\, as I think most people have. The prequels weren't that great\, but I got what I wanted\, more of the story from the Star Wars universe. After waiting more than 30 years to see how the original trilogy continues\, I was so sadly disappointed. This is not a sequel. There is no character development\, there are no story arcs. It's just a collection of McGuffins\, inappropriately timed humor\, and marketing ploys\, to support a very poor plagiarism of the original trilogy. They could have done better writing the story with Mad Libs\, at least there would be some structure to it.

Bottom line: This is not "Star Wars" but a blatant money grab by trying to steal as much of the past as possible. On top of that they had to insert several cheap political points. If you made the mistake of watching this movie\, please go see the original trilogy again. Avoid this movie.
